Reviews.Title: “You pay for the location”
Reviews.Author: JLGabroad
Reviews.Content: decent price locationit pays near major sights tram literally fiveminute walk hagia sophia unless little kids 12 minutes breakfast terrace roof view sea marmara hotel road traffic imagine quieter hotels main roads sultanahmet service fine breakfast nofrills breakfasts turkish hotels arranged airport transfers convenient family basement bed singles baby crib fit fine didnt feel cramped basement slope road actually fairly picturesque view roads sultanahmet ants day wasnt deal care quickly internet tv fine id recommend location nofuss quality breakfast special

Reviews.Title: “5 star location at 3 star prices!”
Reviews.Author: A L
Reviews.Content: hotel thanks lonely planet frankly bit underrated hotel liked personal experience highlight service hotel single staff super helpful friendly helped importantly ramadan tour agent help travel plans day planning travelling major holiday turkish people travel bus train near impossible location hotel ideal hop topkapi palace aya sofya hagia sophia rave location laundry shop street reasonable prices job restaurants street hotel nice super special comfortable air conditioning rooftop terrace breakfast enjoy lovely views relax breakfast served plentiful fresh vegetables fruits addition meats cheeses run hardboiled eggs cook morning run highly recommend hotel stay istanbul

Reviews.Title: “Great location, loud rooms”
Reviews.Author: kanestel
Reviews.Content: absolutely loved location hotel mix bars restaurants istanbul near major sites hagia sophia blue mosque etc marble steps hotel sleep nearly impossible people tramping marble steps sandals sounds stomping echoes throughout building restaurant roof people wake breakfast youre top floor below restaurant hear stomping talking breakfast suitcases bed beds werent comfortable sufficient breakfast nice service front desk decent value mind youre located near major mosques 5 am call prayer extremely loud
